actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 307 of the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that each State shall have at least one very high frequency commercial television station located within the State.

summary.text: Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that there shall be at least one very high frequency commercial television station located within each State.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 307 of the Communications Act of 1934 to provide that each State shall have at least one very high frequency commercial television station located within the State.
